channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Notes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Notes

item.title: CVE-2021-27760|2024-09-17T04:19:12.658Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20notes
item.description: An issue was discovered in the Sametime chat feature in the Notes 11.0 - 11.0.1 FP4 clients. An authenticated Sametime chat user could cause Remote Code Execution on another chat client by sending a specially formatted message through chat containing Javascript code.
